channel.title: Hi! I'm Michael, involved in way too much
channel.description:
Lots of great discussions here. I'm mostly an engineer but am always working on different projects. I am involved in a lot of projects and companies in different markets. Currently I am the lead developer of Forrst and Gamblino. I am bootstrapping my [company][3] and our first [product][4]. Looking forward to getting more involved in the discussions here, so many great insights.
[3]: http://realizetheweb.com [4]: https://accountbundle.com

item.title: Hi! I'm Michael, involved in way too much
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
involved in way too much.

Probably like most of us here…

Read full topic
